title: Best RTX 4060 Ti GPUs in 2024
description: Need help to pick the best RTX 4060 Ti? We're here to help!
author: Rich Edmonds
excerpt: Need help to pick the best RTX 4060 Ti? We're here to help!
text: Nvidia's GeForce RTX 4060 Ti is a great choice for 1080p and 1440p gaming. While it may not be the best Nvidia GPU for price to performance and performance gains over the previous generation, the RTX 4060 Ti is still worth considering as a capable GPU. I've rounded up some of the best Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti GPUs. Source: Zotac Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU Source: Asus Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC Alternate best RTX 4060 Ti GPU Source: MSI MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G Best budget RTX 4060 Ti GPU Asus TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU Source: Gigabyte Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G Best value RTX 4060 Ti Our top picks for the Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti in 2024 Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge One of the best RTX 4060 Ti GPUs The Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge may be one of the more basic RTX 4060 Ti graphics cards available, but it looks otherworldly. Should you be on the hunt for a sleek-looking 1080p gaming machine, look no further than this card. Architecture Ada Lovelace Process 5 nm Ray Accelerators/Cores 34 Stream Processors 4,352 Base Clock Speed 2,310 MHz Boost Clock Speed 2,535 MHz Memory Capacity 8 GB GDDR6 Memory Bus 128-bit Memory Bandwidth 288 GB/s Power Draw 160 W Pros Great design Good performance Cons Limited overclocking This may not be the best graphics card you can buy right now, but we feel the Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge is a quality GPU. It's pretty much a standard RTX 4060 Ti graphics card with a very good-looking shroud. Zotac has nailed its latest GPU designs and this is no exception. It won't decimate faster RTX 4060 Ti GPUs, but this is also compact enough to fit inside smaller PC cases. Alternate best RTX 4060 Ti GPU Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC An excellent RTX 4060 Ti graphics card The Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC is a brilliant compact graphics card for those seeking a GPU for a 1080p monitor. It's about as good as any other baseline RTX 4060 Ti, including the Founders Edition from Nvidia. Architecture Ada Lovelace Process 5 nm Ray Accelerators/Cores 34 Stream Processors 4,352 Base Clock Speed 2,310 MHz Boost Clock Speed 2,535 MHz Memory Capacity 8 GB GDDR6 Memory Bus 128-bit Memory Bandwidth 288 GB/s Power Draw 160 W Pros Compact design Good performance The Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC is about on par with our top pick, making it an excellent second choice if you're unable to find the Zotac card anywhere. It has a more understated design, being part of Asus' more affordable range of graphics cards, but it's still more than capable of running the latest games at 1080p. Best budget RTX 4060 Ti GPU MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G The most affordable RTX 4060 Ti we've found $380 $405 Save $25 The MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G is one of the more affordable RTX 4060 Ti cards available, undercutting even the Founders Edition, depending on where you can locate stock. It's a solid little gaming machine for 1080p. Architecture Ada Lovelace Process 5 nm Ray Accelerators/Cores 34 Stream Processors 4,352 Base Clock Speed 2,310 MHz Boost Clock Speed 2,580 MHz Memory Capacity 8 GB GDDR6 Memory Bus 128-bit Memory Bandwidth 288 GB/s Power Draw 160 W Pros Affordable Still plenty fast for 1080p Cons Not the fastest GPU Limited overclocking On a tight PC build budget? MSI is here with its most affordable RTX 4060 Ti graphics card. It'll perform just about as well as the Founders Edition, if not better. The MSI RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G OC is a solid budget-friendly graphics card with a compact dual-fan design and good performance. It'll happily boost up to 2,580 MHz and the 8GB of GDDR6 VRAM will be used up quickly with the latest games. It won't rock your world but will make for a great gaming companion in more compact systems with Mini-ITX PC cases. Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU Asus TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC Best performance RTX 4060 Ti This RTX 4060 Ti GPU is among the fastest GPUs you'll find on the market, sporting a triple-fan design and a massive heatsink. It has 8GB of GDDR6 memory and supports DLSS 3, paving the way for a reliable gaming experience. Brand Asus Memory 8 GB GDDR6 CUDA Cores 4,352 Architecture Ada Lovelace Process 5 nm Base clock speed 2310 MHz Boost clock speed 2655 MHz Memory bus width 128-bit Memory Bandwidth 288 GB/s Pros Best performance Stunning design The Asus TUF Gaming RTX 4060 Ti is one of the more powerful graphics cards from the series of Nvidia cards. This beast of a gaming machine has three larger fans for maximum cooling, a subtle yet sleek shroud design, and can fit in with most PC build themes. While not massive, this is a sizable card with a tri-fan cooling solution. Asus was able to boost the burst clock speeds up and offer a great 1440p gaming experience. Just be aware that you'll likely see this card pull more current from the PSU do so. Best value RTX 4060 Ti Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G This is one of the better-value RTX 4060 Ti cards If you want a Gigabyte RTX 4060 Ti but don't fancy spending nearly $500, the Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G would be the better choice. It has three fans, good clock speeds, and solid 1080p performance. Architecture Ada Lovelace Process 5 nm Ray Accelerators/Cores 34 Stream Processors 4,352 Base Clock Speed 2,310 MHz Boost Clock Speed 2,580 MHz Memory Capacity 8 GB GDDR6 Memory Bus 128-bit Memory Bandwidth 288 GB/s Power Draw 160 W Pros Good value Tri-fan setup The Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G is a great value choice for those seeking an RTX 4060 Ti. It has a great cooling solution for such a low-power GPU, sporting three fans. This allows it to boost up beyond the Founders Edition and other cheaper RTX 4060 Ti GPUs. It's also larger because of this and as such we'd recommend checking if your PC case will be able to support such a graphics card. Best OEM RTX 4060 Ti Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Founders Edition Get the GPU straight from Nvidia The Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti was launched to replace the popular RTX 3060 Ti. This is a GPU that's designed for 1080p gaming with decent results, but we'd recommend looking elsewhere if possible and only buying this GPU as a last resort. Architecture Ada Lovelace Process 5nm Ray Accelerators/Cores 34 Stream Processors 4,352 Base Clock Speed 2,310MHz Boost Clock Speed 2,535MHz Memory Capacity 8GB GDDR6 Memory Bus 128-bit Memory Bandwidth 288GB/s Power Draw 160 W Pros OEM performance Solid build quality If you prefer to use Nvidia's own cards, this will be the RTX 4060 Ti to buy. It has the similar RTX 40 series design we've seen in other cards, including the mighty RTX 4090. The specifications essentially mirror what Nvidia has on the page for the GPU itself, acting as a baseline for OEM partners. It won't be the most powerful RTX 4060 Ti available, nor will it offer the best value, but this is a good choice for those who prefer to stick to team green for just about everything. Choosing the best Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti GPU Picking the best RTX 4060 Ti depends on how much budget is available and if you're tight on space inside the case. We're big fans of the Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge with its alien-like curvy design and solid performance. This is also a card with just two fans, making it easy to install inside just about any PC case. Like other smaller RTX 4060 Ti GPUs, this won't win any awards for performance, but it'll be a good match for a decent 1080p gaming monitor. Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge The Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge may be one of the more basic RTX 4060 Ti graphics cards available, but it looks otherworldly. Should you be on the hunt for a sleek-looking 1080p gaming machine, look no further than this card.
html:
Nvidia's GeForce RTX 4060 Ti is a great choice for 1080p and 1440p gaming. While it may not be the best Nvidia GPU for price to performance and performance gains over the previous generation, the RTX 4060 Ti is still worth considering as a capable GPU. I've rounded up some of the best Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti GPUs.

  • Source: Zotac

    Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge

    Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU

  • Source: Asus

    Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC

    Alternate best RTX 4060 Ti GPU

  • Source: MSI

    MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G

    Best budget RTX 4060 Ti GPU

  • Asus TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC

    Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU

  • Source: Gigabyte

    Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G

    Best value RTX 4060 Ti

Our top picks for the Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti in 2024

Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU

Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge

One of the best RTX 4060 Ti GPUs

The Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge may be one of the more basic RTX 4060 Ti graphics cards available, but it looks otherworldly. Should you be on the hunt for a sleek-looking 1080p gaming machine, look no further than this card.

Pros

  • Great design
  • Good performance

Cons

  • Limited overclocking

This may not be the best graphics card you can buy right now, but we feel the Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge is a quality GPU. It's pretty much a standard RTX 4060 Ti graphics card with a very good-looking shroud. Zotac has nailed its latest GPU designs and this is no exception. It won't decimate faster RTX 4060 Ti GPUs, but this is also compact enough to fit inside smaller PC cases.

Alternate best RTX 4060 Ti GPU

Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC

An excellent RTX 4060 Ti graphics card

The Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC is a brilliant compact graphics card for those seeking a GPU for a 1080p monitor. It's about as good as any other baseline RTX 4060 Ti, including the Founders Edition from Nvidia.

  • Compact design
  • Good performance

The Asus Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC is about on par with our top pick, making it an excellent second choice if you're unable to find the Zotac card anywhere. It has a more understated design, being part of Asus' more affordable range of graphics cards, but it's still more than capable of running the latest games at 1080p.

Best budget RTX 4060 Ti GPU

MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G

The most affordable RTX 4060 Ti we've found

$380 $405 Save $25

The MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G is one of the more affordable RTX 4060 Ti cards available, undercutting even the Founders Edition, depending on where you can locate stock. It's a solid little gaming machine for 1080p.

  • Still plenty fast for 1080p

Cons

  • Not the fastest GPU
  • Limited overclocking

On a tight PC build budget? MSI is here with its most affordable RTX 4060 Ti graphics card. It'll perform just about as well as the Founders Edition, if not better. The MSI RTX 4060 Ti Ventus 2X Black 8G OC is a solid budget-friendly graphics card with a compact dual-fan design and good performance. It'll happily boost up to 2,580 MHz and the 8GB of GDDR6 VRAM will be used up quickly with the latest games. It won't rock your world but will make for a great gaming companion in more compact systems with Mini-ITX PC cases.

Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU

Asus TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti OC

Best performance RTX 4060 Ti

This RTX 4060 Ti GPU is among the fastest GPUs you'll find on the market, sporting a triple-fan design and a massive heatsink. It has 8GB of GDDR6 memory and supports DLSS 3, paving the way for a reliable gaming experience.

The Asus TUF Gaming RTX 4060 Ti is one of the more powerful graphics cards from the series of Nvidia cards. This beast of a gaming machine has three larger fans for maximum cooling, a subtle yet sleek shroud design, and can fit in with most PC build themes. While not massive, this is a sizable card with a tri-fan cooling solution. Asus was able to boost the burst clock speeds up and offer a great 1440p gaming experience. Just be aware that you'll likely see this card pull more current from the PSU do so.

Best value RTX 4060 Ti

Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G

This is one of the better-value RTX 4060 Ti cards

If you want a Gigabyte RTX 4060 Ti but don't fancy spending nearly $500, the Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G would be the better choice. It has three fans, good clock speeds, and solid 1080p performance.

The Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Gaming OC 8G is a great value choice for those seeking an RTX 4060 Ti. It has a great cooling solution for such a low-power GPU, sporting three fans. This allows it to boost up beyond the Founders Edition and other cheaper RTX 4060 Ti GPUs. It's also larger because of this and as such we'd recommend checking if your PC case will be able to support such a graphics card.

Best OEM RTX 4060 Ti

Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Founders Edition

Get the GPU straight from Nvidia

The Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti was launched to replace the popular RTX 3060 Ti. This is a GPU that's designed for 1080p gaming with decent results, but we'd recommend looking elsewhere if possible and only buying this GPU as a last resort.

If you prefer to use Nvidia's own cards, this will be the RTX 4060 Ti to buy. It has the similar RTX 40 series design we've seen in other cards, including the mighty RTX 4090. The specifications essentially mirror what Nvidia has on the page for the GPU itself, acting as a baseline for OEM partners. It won't be the most powerful RTX 4060 Ti available, nor will it offer the best value, but this is a good choice for those who prefer to stick to team green for just about everything.

Choosing the best Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti GPU

Picking the best RTX 4060 Ti depends on how much budget is available and if you're tight on space inside the case. We're big fans of the Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge with its alien-like curvy design and solid performance. This is also a card with just two fans, making it easy to install inside just about any PC case. Like other smaller RTX 4060 Ti GPUs, this won't win any awards for performance, but it'll be a good match for a decent 1080p gaming monitor.

Best RTX 4060 Ti GPU

Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge

The Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 4060 Ti 8GB Twin Edge may be one of the more basic RTX 4060 Ti graphics cards available, but it looks otherworldly. Should you be on the hunt for a sleek-looking 1080p gaming machine, look no further than this card.
